sentence.Network_en: Nephrite is one of China's most five famous jades.

sentence.Network_en: Made of a single piece of nephrite, Lot 140 was remarkable.
sentence.Network_cn: 140号藏品特别引入注目,因为它是由整块软玉雕琢而成.

sentence.Network_en: The mechanism of thermal transformation for nephrite cat's eye are discussed.
sentence.Network_cn: 并对软玉猫眼的热相变反应机制进行了探讨.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from German Nephrit, from Greek nephros 'kidney' (with reference to its supposed efficacy in treating kidney disease)

means.word_mean: 1. an amphibole mineral consisting of calcium magnesium silicate in monoclinic crystalline form; a source of jade that is less valuable than from jadeite; once believed to cure kidney disorders
